mapper.select:
SELECT dt.* FROM springboot.logging dt WHERE dt .delete_flag = 0
AND date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(dt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format( #{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(dt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format( #{startTime2},'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format( dt.end_times,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format( #{endTime2},'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(dt.end_times,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND dt.create_ids = #{createIds}
LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageNumber}

SELECT count(*) FROM springboot.logging dt WHERE dt .delete_flag = 0
AND date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(dt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format( #{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(dt.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format( #{startTime2},'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format( dt.end_times,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format( #{endTime2},'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(dt.end_times,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND dt.create_ids = #{createIds}
